name: At cost based method or Lower of costs or market (LOCOM) indicator
description: At cost based method or Lower of costs or market (LOCOM) indicator distinguishes the used accounting portfolio for national General Accepted Accounting Principles (nGAAP) between those that use the At cost based method or Lower of costs or market (LOCOM), and those that do not use At cost based method or Lower of costs or carket (LOCOM).
